pr_title: Harvester / From folder / Unable to reset XSLT once set

timeline.message:
Harvester / From folder / Unable to reset XSLT once set

Same approach to unset the value on update for CSW. See https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/blob/master/harvesters/src/main/java/org/fao/geonet/kernel/harvest/harvester/csw/CswParams.java#L119.

timeline.bodyText: In the CSW code it's used "", while here it's used "none", to confirm that the difference is correct?
timeline.author: josegar74

replies.bodyText: In the create of AbstractParam it is set to none https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/blob/master/harvesters/src/main/java/org/fao/geonet/kernel/harvest/harvester/AbstractParams.java#L200
replies.author: fxprunayre
